parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when registration is successful

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: You need to get access_token by calling your permission on file. Setup app_id and app_secret on Account.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, and shop_id concatenated with '|' symbol using sha256 hashing algorithm

parameters.name: order_sn
parameters.description: Request unique identifier for an order

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if any error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if error. Empty if no error happened
